sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-btn
      color="primary"
      >Thêm sản phẩm</v-btn
    >
    <v-alert
      border="left"
      close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="this.$route.params.message"
    >
      {{ this.$route.params.message }}
    </v-alert>
    
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <v-col sm="4" class="pa-3" v-for="product in products" :key="product._id">
        <v-card
          class="pa-1"
          :to="{ name: 'detail-pro', params: { id: product._id } }"
        >
          <v-card class="pa-1">
            <v-img height="250" :src="`/${product.image}`"></v-img>
          </v-card>
          <v-card-title class="headline">{{ product.name }}</v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "../services/api.product";
export default {
  name: "Home",
  data() {
    return {
      products: [],
    };
  },

  async created() {
    this.products = await API.getAllProduct();
    console.log(this.products);
  },
};
</script>
